item.title: Variational Inference for Multiple Outcomes
item.description: Introduction It is common to have multiple outcomes of interest in a single study. Usually, these outcomes are analysed separately, ignoring the correlation between them. In high dimensional setting, one would expect that a carefully designed multivariate approach would be a more efficient alternative to individual analyses of each outcome [Rothman et al.,2010]. For jointly modeling multiple correlated outcomes, we have developed a statisitcal method in this paper. Here we provide same demonstrations for our method, which is implemented in the R package vimco.

item.title: Fabs for Nonconvex Loss and Adaptive LASSO
item.description: Introduction It is common to have multiple outcomes of interest in a single study. Usually, these outcomes are analysed separately, ignoring the correlation between them. In high dimensional setting, one would expect that a carefully designed multivariate approach would be a more efficient alternative to individual analyses of each outcome [cite]. For jointly modeling multiple correlated outcomes, we have developed the method vimco. Here we provide same demonstrations. Assume we have measured \(q\) responses \(y_1, \dots, y_q\) and the same set of \(p\) predictors on each individual \(x_1,\dots, x_p\).

item.title: Publication
item.description: Q. Cheng, T. Qiu, X. Chai, B. Sun, Y. Xia, X. Shi\(^\ast\), J. Liu\(^\ast\) (2021) MR-Corr\(^2\): a two-sample Mendelian randomization method that accounts for correlated horizontal pleiotropy using correlated instrumental variants. R Package X. Zhang, X. Liu, X. Shi\(^\ast\) (2021) Model Selection for Varying Coefficient Nonparametric Transformation Model. R package X. Shi, X. Chai, Y. Yang, Q. Cheng, Y. Jiao, H Chen, J. Huang, C. Yang, J.

item.title: 个人简介
item.description: 史兴杰 南京财经大学，统计系副教授(校聘教授) 国际统计学会推选会士（ISI Elected member） 现场统计研究会环境与资源统计学会理事 研究方向：组学遗传学统计建模、高维大数据统计计算、生存分析 通讯地址：江苏省南京财经大学德经楼219 邮箱: shixingjie0615@gmail.com div.blue { background-color:#E3AF63; border-radius: 5px; padding: 20px;} 2009.09 — 2014.06\(~~~~\) 上海财经大学\(~~~~~\) 统计学 博士(硕博连读) 2012.09 — 2014.04\(~~~~\) 耶鲁大学\(~~~~~\) 生物统计学 联合培养 2005.09 — 2009.06\(~~~~\) 南京审计学院\(~~~~~\) 数学与应用数学 本科
